## IMarketplace.getActiveOffer() method

If the `address` has made an offer to the specified listing, this method will fetch the offer and return it. If no offer has been made, this method will return `undefined`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getActiveOffer(listingId: BigNumberish, address: string): Promise<Offer | undefined>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  listingId | BigNumberish | Id of the listing to get offers for. |
|  address | string | Address of the buyer. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[Offer](./sdk.offer.md) \| undefined&gt;
